sentences.sentence: The Christmas Even ten year ago still alive in my memory, I wish all my best friends God Jul och Gott Nytt ar!
sentences.translation: 十年前的圣诞平安夜历历在目，今年的平安夜祝愿好友一生平安！

sentences.sentence: We hope you'll agree that we've sort of gott right, if not please feel free to discuss at the foot of the article.
sentences.translation: 我希望您们能够同意我这么做，否则请把你的意见留在下面的留言板。

sentences.sentence: For years, American courts upheld in loco parentis in cases such as Gott versus Berea College in nineteen thirteen.
sentences.translation: 多年以来，在诸如1913年戈特对伯里亚学院的诉讼案例中，美国法庭一直支持“代替父母”。
